00001 !******************************************************************************
00002 ! Module containing routines to create derivative operators
00003 !******************************************************************************
00004 ! REQUIRED FILES:
00005 ! PRECISION_VARS.F90      *DEFINES PRECISION FOR ALL VARIABLES
00006 !******************************************************************************
00007       module SBP_Coef_Module
00008 
00009       use precision_vars, only: wp
00010 
00011       implicit none; save
00012 
00013       real(wp),  parameter                      :: tol=1.0e-12_wp
00014 
00015       private
00016       public  :: Define_CSR_Operators,Pmat,Pinv,iD1,jD1,D1,iD2,jD2,D2,nnz_D2
00017       public  :: nnz_D1_per,iD1_per,jD1_per,D1_per,nnz_D1
00018       public  :: nnz_D2_per,iD2_per,jD2_per,D2_per
00019       
00020       real(wp),  dimension(:), allocatable :: Pmat,Pinv,D1,D2,D1_per,D2_per
00021       integer,   dimension(:), allocatable :: iD1, iD2,jD1,jD2,iD1_per,jD1_per
00022       integer,   dimension(:), allocatable :: iD2_per,jD2_per

00024       integer                              :: nnz_D2_per

00028 !==============================================================================
00029       subroutine Define_CSR_Operators(n,h)
00030       
00031       
00032       integer,  intent(in) :: n
00033       real(wp), intent(in) :: h
00034       integer,  parameter  :: order = 242
00035 
00036 !     CSR storage for derivative matrices
00037 
00038       
00039       allocate(iD1(n+1),iD2(n+1),Pmat(n),Pinv(n))
00040 
00041       if(order == 242) then
00042         nnz_D1 = 28+4*(n-8)
00043         allocate(jD1(nnz_D1),D1(nnz_D1))
00044         nnz_D2 = 38+5*(n-8)
00045         allocate(jD2(nnz_D2),D2(nnz_D2))
00046       endif
00047       
00048       nnz_D1_per=4*n
00049       allocate(iD1_per(n+1),jD1_per(nnz_D1_per),D1_per(nnz_D1_per))
00050       nnz_D2_per=5*n
00051       allocate(iD2_per(n+1),jD2_per(nnz_D2_per),D2_per(nnz_D2_per))
00052       
00053       call D1_242(n,nnz_D1,iD1,jD1,D1,h)
00054       call D2_242(n,nnz_D2,iD2,jD2,D2,h)
00055       call D1_periodic(n,nnz_D1_per,iD1_per,jD1_per,D1_per,h)
00056       call D2_periodic(n,nnz_D2_per,iD2_per,jD2_per,D2_per,h)
00057       end subroutine Define_CSR_Operators
00058 !==============================================================================         
00059       subroutine D1_periodic(n,nnz,ia,ja,a,h)
00060 
00061       integer,                    intent(in   ) :: n,nnz
00062 
00063       integer,   dimension(n+1),  intent(  out) :: ia
00064       integer,   dimension(nnz),  intent(  out) :: ja
00065 
00066       real(wp),  dimension(nnz),  intent(  out) ::  a
00067       real(wp),                   intent(in   ) :: h
00068 
00069       integer                                   :: i,j
00070       integer                                   :: icnt, jcnt
00071 
00072       real(wp),  dimension(5)      :: d1mat
00073       real(wp) :: tol
00074       
00075       
00076        !  Diagonal matrix norm needed for 1st- and 2nd-order derivatives 
00077       Pmat(:) = 1.0_wp*h
00078       Pinv(:) = 1.0_wp / Pmat(:)
00079       
00080       d1mat(:)= (/1.0_wp/12.0_wp,-8.0_wp/12.0_wp,0.0_wp, &
00081      &            8.0_wp/12.0_wp,-1.0_wp/12.0_wp/)
00082       
00083       tol=1.0e-12_wp
00084       
00085       ia(:) = (/ (i, i=1,n*4+1,4) /)
00086       ja(:) = 0      ;
00087       a(:) = 0.0_wp ;
00088       ia(1) = 1      ! start at beginning of array   
00089          
00090       a(1:2)=d1mat(4:5); ja(1:2)=(/2,3/)
00091       a(3:4)=d1mat(1:2); ja(3:4)=(/n-1,n/)
00092       a(5)  =d1mat(2)  ; ja(5)  =1
00093       a(6:7)=d1mat(4:5); ja(6:7)=(/3,4/)
00094       a(8)  =d1mat(1)  ; ja(8)  =n
00095       icnt  = 8
00096           
00097       do i = 3,n-2
00098         jcnt = 0 
00099         do j = 1,5
00100           if(abs(d1mat(j)) >= tol) then
00101               icnt = icnt + 1 ; jcnt = jcnt + 1 ;
00102           ja(icnt) = i-3+j
00103            a(icnt) = d1mat(j)
00104           endif
00105         enddo
00106 !        ia(i+1) = ia(i) + jcnt
00107       enddo
00108       
00109       a(icnt+1)       =d1mat(5)  ; ja(icnt+1)       =1
00110       a(icnt+2:icnt+3)=d1mat(1:2); ja(icnt+2:icnt+3)=(/n-3,n-2/)
00111       a(icnt+4)       =d1mat(4)  ; ja(icnt+4)       =n
00112       a(icnt+5:icnt+6)=d1mat(4:5); ja(icnt+5:icnt+6)=(/1,2/)            
00113       a(icnt+7:icnt+8)=d1mat(1:2); ja(icnt+7:icnt+8)=(/n-2,n-1/)  
00114       a(:)=a(:)/h   
00115       
00116       end subroutine D1_periodic
00117 !==============================================================================         
00118       subroutine D2_periodic(n,nnz,ia,ja,a,h)
00119 
00120       integer,                    intent(in   ) :: n,nnz
00121 
00122       integer,   dimension(n+1),  intent(  out) :: ia
00123       integer,   dimension(nnz),  intent(  out) :: ja
00124 
00125       real(wp),  dimension(nnz),  intent(  out) ::  a
00126       real(wp),                   intent(in   ) :: h
00127 
00128       integer                                   :: i,j
00129       integer                                   :: icnt, jcnt
00130 
00131       real(wp),  dimension(5)      :: d2mat
00132       real(wp) :: tol
00133             
00134       d2mat(:) = (/-1.0_wp,16.0_wp,-30.0_wp,16.0_wp,-1.0_wp/)/12.0_wp
00135       
00136       tol=1.0e-12_wp
00137       
00138       ia(:) = (/ (i, i=1,n*5+1,5) /)
00139       ja(:) = 0      ;
00140       a(:) = 0.0_wp ;
00141       ia(1) = 1      ! start at beginning of array   
00142          
00143       a(1:3)=d2mat(3:5); ja(1:3)=(/1,2,3/)
00144       a(4:5)=d2mat(1:2); ja(4:5)=(/n-1,n/)
00145       a(6:9)=d2mat(2:5); ja(6:9)=(/1,2,3,4/)
00146       a(10) =d2mat(1)  ; ja(10) =n
00147       icnt  = 10
00148           
00149       do i = 3,n-2
00150         jcnt = 0 
00151         do j = 1,5
00152           if(abs(d2mat(j)) >= tol) then
00153               icnt = icnt + 1 ; jcnt = jcnt + 1 ;
00154           ja(icnt) = i-3+j
00155            a(icnt) = d2mat(j)
00156           endif
00157         enddo
00158 !        ia(i+1) = ia(i) + jcnt
00159       enddo
00160       
00161       a(icnt+1)        =d2mat(5)  ; ja(icnt+1)        =1
00162       a(icnt+2:icnt+5) =d2mat(1:4); ja(icnt+2:icnt+5) =(/n-3,n-2,n-1,n/)
00163       a(icnt+6:icnt+7) =d2mat(4:5); ja(icnt+6:icnt+7) =(/1,2/)            
00164       a(icnt+8:icnt+10)=d2mat(1:3); ja(icnt+8:icnt+10)=(/n-2,n-1,n/)  
00165       a(:)=a(:)/h /h  
00166 
00167       end subroutine D2_periodic
00168 !===============================================================================   
00169      
00170       subroutine D1_242(n,nnz,ia,ja,a,h)
00171 
00172       integer,                    intent(in   ) :: n,nnz
00173 
00174       integer,   dimension(n+1),  intent(  out) :: ia
00175       integer,   dimension(nnz),  intent(  out) :: ja
00176 
00177       real(wp),  dimension(nnz),  intent(  out) ::  a
00178       real(wp),                   intent(in   ) :: h
00179 
00180       integer                                   :: i,j
00181       real(wp),  allocatable, dimension(:)      :: d1mat
00182       real(wp),  allocatable, dimension(:,:)    :: D1blk, D2blk, D1blkT
00183 
00184       continue
00185 
00186       if(n < 8) then 
00187         write(*,*)'Dimension not large enough to support D242: stopping'
00188         stop
00189       endif
00190       allocate(d1mat(1:5))
00191       allocate(D1blk(1:4,1:6))
00192       allocate(D2blk(1:4,1:6))
00193       allocate(D1blkT(1:6,1:4))
00194 
00195     !  h = 1.0_wp / (n - 1)
00196 
00197       !  Diagonal matrix norm needed for 1st- and 2nd-order derivatives 
00198       Pmat(1:  4) = reshape((/17.0_wp/48.0_wp,59.0_wp/48.0_wp,43.0_wp/48.0_wp,49.0_wp/48.0_wp/),(/4/))
00199       Pmat(5:n-4) = 1.0_wp
00200       Pmat(n-3:n) = reshape((/49.0_wp/48.0_wp,43.0_wp/48.0_wp,59.0_wp/48.0_wp,17.0_wp/48.0_wp/),(/4/))
00201 
00202       Pmat(:)=Pmat(:)*h
00203 
00204 
00205       Pinv(:) = 1.0_wp / Pmat(:)
00206 
00207       d1mat(:)= reshape((/1.0_wp/12.0_wp,-8.0_wp/12.0_wp,0.0_wp,8.0_wp/12.0_wp,-1.0_wp/12.0_wp/),(/5/))
00208 
00209       !  Boundary closure data for first derivative operators,  Note reshape does column first; hence the transpose
00210       D1blkT  = reshape(                                                                                               &
00211               & (/-24.0_wp/17.0_wp, 59.0_wp/34.0_wp, -4.0_wp/17.0_wp,-3.0_wp/34.0_wp, 0.0_wp        , 0.0_wp,          &
00212               &    -1.0_wp/ 2.0_wp,  0.0_wp        ,  1.0_wp/2.0_wp , 0.0_wp        , 0.0_wp        , 0.0_wp,          &
00213               &     4.0_wp/43.0_wp,-59.0_wp/86.0_wp,  0.0_wp        ,59.0_wp/86.0_wp,-4.0_wp/43.0_wp, 0.0_wp,          &
00214               &     3.0_wp/98.0_wp,  0.0_wp        ,-59.0_wp/98.0_wp, 0.0_wp        ,32.0_wp/49.0_wp,-4.0_wp/49.0_wp/),&
00215               & (/6,4/)  )
00216       D1blk = Transpose(D1blkT)
00217 
00218       !  Derivative operators are ``per-symmetric''
00219       do i=1,4
00220          do j=1,6
00221            D2blk(i,j)= - D1blk(5-i,7-j)
00222          end do
00223       end do
00224      
00225       !  Assemble derivative operator into compressed sparse row storage format
00226       call CSR_Filler(n,nnz,d1mat,D1blk,D2blk, ia,ja,a)
00227 
00228       !  account for spatial grid spacing.  Assumes domain is 0 <= x <= 1  
00229       a(:) = a(:) / h
00230 
00231       !  Derivative operator must differentiate monomials of sufficient order to be correct.
00232       call test_error(1,n,ia,ja,a)
00233 
00234       deallocate(d1mat,D1blk,D2blk,D1blkT)
00235 
00236 
00237       end subroutine D1_242
00238 
00239 ! =============================================================================
00240 
00241       subroutine D2_242(n,nnz,ia,ja,a,h)
00242 
00243       integer,                    intent(in   ) :: n,nnz
00244 
00245       integer,   dimension(n+1),  intent(  out) :: ia
00246       integer,   dimension(nnz),  intent(  out) :: ja
00247 
00248       real(wp),  dimension(nnz),  intent(  out) ::  a
00249       real(wp),                   intent(in   ) :: h
00250       
00251       real(wp),  dimension(4  )                 ::  Pmat_L, Pinv_L
00252 
00253       integer                                   :: i,j
00254       real(wp)                                  :: m24
00255       real(wp),  allocatable, dimension(:)      :: d1vec, d2mat
00256       real(wp),  allocatable, dimension(:,:)    :: M1blk, M2blk, M1blkT1, M1blkT2
00257       real(wp),  allocatable, dimension(:,:)    :: D1blk, D2blk
00258 
00259       continue
00260 
00261       if(n < 8) then 
00262         write(*,*)'Dimension not large enough to support D242: stopping'
00263         stop
00264       endif
00265       allocate(d1vec(1:4))
00266       allocate(d2mat(1:5))
00267       allocate(M1blk(1:4,1:6),M2blk(1:4,1:6))
00268       allocate(M1blkT1(1:6,1:4),M1blkT2(1:6,1:4))
00269       allocate(D1blk(1:4,1:6),D2blk(1:4,1:6))
00270 
00271   !    h = 1.0_wp / (n - 1)
00272 
00273       Pmat_L(1:4) = reshape((/17.0_wp/48.0_wp,59.0_wp/48.0_wp,43.0_wp/48.0_wp,49.0_wp/48.0_wp/),(/4/))
00274 
00275       Pinv_L(:)   = 1.0_wp / Pmat_L(:)
00276 
00277       d1vec(:) = + reshape((/-24.0_wp/17.0_wp, 59.0_wp/34.0_wp,-4.0_wp/17.0_wp, -3.0_wp/34.0_wp                /),(/4/))
00278       d2mat(:) = - reshape((/  1.0_wp/12.0_wp,-16.0_wp/12.0_wp,30.0_wp/12.0_wp,-16.0_wp/12.0_wp,1.0_wp/12.0_wp /),(/5/))
00279 
00280       m24 = 16815244.0_wp/410099621.0_wp
00281       M1blkT1= reshape(                                                                                                 &
00282               & (/  9.0_wp/ 8.0_wp,-59.0_wp/48.0_wp, +1.0_wp/12.0_wp,  1.0_wp/48.0_wp, 0.0_wp        , 0.0_wp,          &
00283               &   -59.0_wp/48.0_wp, 59.0_wp/24.0_wp,-59.0_wp/48.0_wp,  0.0_wp        , 0.0_wp        , 0.0_wp,          &
00284               &     1.0_wp/12.0_wp,-59.0_wp/48.0_wp, 55.0_wp/24.0_wp,-59.0_wp/48.0_wp, 1.0_wp/12.0_wp, 0.0_wp,          &
00285               &     1.0_wp/48.0_wp,  0.0_wp        ,-59.0_wp/48.0_wp, 59.0_wp/24.0_wp,-4.0_wp/ 3.0_wp, 1.0_wp/12.0_wp/),&
00286               & (/6,4/)  )
00287       M1blkT2= reshape(                                                                                         &
00288               & (/-1.0_wp/3.0_wp*m24,+1.0_wp/1.0_wp*m24,-1.0_wp/1.0_wp*m24,+1.0_wp/3.0_wp*m24, 0.0_wp, 0.0_wp,  &
00289               &   +1.0_wp/1.0_wp*m24,-3.0_wp/1.0_wp*m24,+3.0_wp/1.0_wp*m24,-1.0_wp/1.0_wp*m24, 0.0_wp, 0.0_wp,  &
00290               &   -1.0_wp/1.0_wp*m24,+3.0_wp/1.0_wp*m24,-3.0_wp/1.0_wp*m24,+1.0_wp/1.0_wp*m24, 0.0_wp, 0.0_wp,  &
00291               &   +1.0_wp/3.0_wp*m24,-1.0_wp/1.0_wp*m24,+1.0_wp/1.0_wp*m24,-1.0_wp/3.0_wp*m24, 0.0_wp, 0.0_wp/),&
00292               & (/6,4/)  )
00293       M1blk = Transpose(-M1blkT1-M1blkT2)
00294 
00295       do i=1,4
00296          do j=1,6
00297            M2blk(i,j)= + M1blk(5-i,7-j)
00298          end do
00299       end do
00300 
00301       do j = 1,4
00302         M1blk(1,  j) = M1blk(1,  j) - d1vec(j)
00303         M2blk(4,7-j) = M2blk(4,7-j) - d1vec(j)
00304       enddo
00305       do i = 1,4
00306         D1blk(i,:) = Pinv_L(  i)*M1blk(i,:)
00307         D2blk(i,:) = Pinv_L(5-i)*M2blk(i,:)
00308       enddo
00309 
00310       call CSR_Filler(n,nnz,d2mat,D1blk,D2blk, ia,ja,a)
00311 
00312       a(:) = a(:) / h / h
00313       call test_error(2,n,ia,ja,a)
00314 
00315       deallocate(d1vec,d2mat,M1blk,M2blk,M1blkT1,M1blkT2,D1blk,D2blk)
00316 
00317       end subroutine D2_242
00318 
00319 ! ======================================================================================
00320 
00321       subroutine CSR_Filler(n,nnz,dmat,D1blk,D2blk, ia,ja,a)
00322 
00323       !  Store the Derivative matrix in CSR format
00324 
00325       implicit none
00326 
00327       real(wp),  parameter                     :: tol=1.0e-12_wp
00328 
00329       integer,                   intent(in   ) :: n,nnz
00330       real(wp),  dimension(:),   intent(in   ) :: dmat
00331       real(wp),  dimension(:,:), intent(in   ) :: D1blk,D2blk
00332 
00333       integer,   dimension(:),   intent(  out) :: ia
00334       integer,   dimension(:),   intent(  out) :: ja
00335       real(wp),  dimension(:),   intent(  out) ::  a
00336 
00337       integer                                  :: i,j,k
00338       integer                                  :: icnt, jcnt
00339 
00340       continue
00341 
00342       icnt  = 0      ; jcnt = 0 
00343 
00344       ia(:) = 0      ; ja(:) = 0      ;
00345        a(:) = 0.0_wp ;
00346       ia(1) = 1      ! start at beginning of array
00347 
00348       !  load derivative matrix info into CSR buckets:  Left block boundary
00349 
00350       do i = 1,4
00351         jcnt = 0 
00352         do j = 1,6
00353           if(abs(D1blk(i,j)) >= tol) then
00354               icnt = icnt + 1 ; jcnt = jcnt + 1 ;
00355           ja(icnt) = j
00356            a(icnt) = D1blk(i,j)
00357           endif
00358         enddo
00359         ia(i+1) = ia(i) + jcnt
00360       enddo
00361   
00362       !  load derivative matrix info into CSR buckets:  interior
00363       do i = 5,n-4
00364         jcnt = 0 
00365         do j = 1,5
00366           if(abs(dmat(j)) >= tol) then
00367               icnt = icnt + 1 ; jcnt = jcnt + 1 ;
00368           ja(icnt) = i-3+j
00369            a(icnt) = dmat(j)
00370           endif
00371         enddo
00372         ia(i+1) = ia(i) + jcnt
00373       enddo
00374  
00375       do i = 1,4
00376          k = n-4+i
00377         jcnt = 0 
00378         do j = 1,6
00379           if(abs(D2blk(i,j)) >= tol) then
00380               icnt = icnt + 1 ; jcnt = jcnt + 1 ;
00381           ja(icnt) = n-6+j
00382            a(icnt) = D2blk(i,j)
00383           endif
00384         enddo
00385         ia(k+1) = ia(k) + jcnt
00386       enddo
00387       if(icnt /= nnz) then
00388         write(*,*)'dimension of nnz buckets is incorrect: stopping'
00389         write(*,*)'icnt, nnz', icnt, nnz
00390         stop
00391       endif
00392 
00393       end subroutine CSR_Filler
00394 
00395 ! ======================================================================================
00396 
00397       subroutine test_error(order,n,ia,ja,a)
00398 
00399       implicit none
00400 
00401       integer,                   intent(in) :: order, n
00402       integer,   dimension(:),   intent(in) :: ia
00403       integer,   dimension(:),   intent(in) :: ja
00404       real(wp),  dimension(:),   intent(in) ::  a
00405       integer                               ::  i
00406 
00407       real(wp),  allocatable, dimension(:)  :: err,  x0_vec ,  x1_vec ,   x2_vec,   x3_vec
00408       real(wp),  allocatable, dimension(:)  ::     d1x0_vec ,d1x1_vec , d1x2_vec, d1x3_vec
00409       real(wp),  allocatable, dimension(:)  ::     d1x0T_vec,d1x1T_vec,d1x2T_vec,d1x3T_vec
00410       real(wp),  allocatable, dimension(:)  ::      d2x0_vec, d2x1_vec, d2x2_vec, d2x3_vec
00411       real(wp),  allocatable, dimension(:)  ::     d2x0T_vec,d2x1T_vec,d2x2T_vec,d2x3T_vec
00412 
00413       real(wp)                              :: tnorm, x
00414 
00415       continue
00416 
00417       allocate(  x0_vec(n),  x1_vec(n),  x2_vec(n),  x3_vec(n))
00418       allocate(d1x0_vec(n) ,d1x1_vec(n) ,d1x2_vec(n) ,d1x3_vec(n) )
00419       allocate(d1x0T_vec(n),d1x1T_vec(n),d1x2T_vec(n),d1x3T_vec(n))
00420       allocate(d2x0_vec(n) ,d2x1_vec(n) ,d2x2_vec(n) ,d2x3_vec(n) )
00421       allocate(d2x0T_vec(n),d2x1T_vec(n),d2x2T_vec(n),d2x3T_vec(n))
00422       allocate(err(n))
00423 
00424       do i = 1,n
00425          x = 1.0_wp*(i-1)/(n-1)
00426         x0_vec(i) = 1.0_wp       ; d1x0_vec(i) = 0.0_wp     ; d2x0_vec(i) = 0.0_wp
00427         x1_vec(i) = 1.0_wp*x     ; d1x1_vec(i) = 1.0_wp     ; d2x1_vec(i) = 0.0_wp
00428         x2_vec(i) = 1.0_wp*x*x   ; d1x2_vec(i) = 2.0_wp*x   ; d2x2_vec(i) = 2.0_wp
00429         x3_vec(i) = 1.0_wp*x*x*x ; d1x3_vec(i) = 3.0_wp*x*x ; d2x3_vec(i) = 6.0_wp*x
00430       enddo
00431 
00432       if(order == 1) then
00433          call amux_local (n, x0_vec,d1x0T_vec, a,ja,ia)
00434          call amux_local (n, x1_vec,d1x1T_vec, a,ja,ia)
00435          call amux_local (n, x2_vec,d1x2T_vec, a,ja,ia)
00436          call amux_local (n, x3_vec,d1x3T_vec, a,ja,ia)
00437          err(:) = d1x0_vec(:) - d1x0T_vec(:) &
00438                 + d1x1_vec(:) - d1x1T_vec(:) &
00439                 + d1x2_vec(:) - d1x2T_vec(:) !&
00440                 !+ d1x3_vec(:) - d1x3T_vec(:)
00441          tnorm = maxval(err)
00442 !         write(*,*)'error in  first derivative',tnorm
00443 !         if(tnorm >= tol) write(*,*)'maxerr',maxval(err)
00444       elseif(order == 2) then
00445          call amux_local (n, x0_vec,d2x0T_vec, a,ja,ia)
00446          call amux_local (n, x1_vec,d2x1T_vec, a,ja,ia)
00447          call amux_local (n, x2_vec,d2x2T_vec, a,ja,ia)
00448          call amux_local (n, x3_vec,d2x3T_vec, a,ja,ia)
00449 
00450          err(:) = d2x0_vec(:) - d2x0T_vec(:) &
00451                 + d2x1_vec(:) - d2x1T_vec(:) &
00452                 + d2x2_vec(:) - d2x2T_vec(:) !&
00453                 !+ d2x3_vec(:) - d2x3T_vec(:)
00454          tnorm = maxval(err)
00455 !         write(*,*)'error in second derivative',tnorm
00456 !         if(tnorm >= tol) write(*,*)'maxerr',maxval(err)
00457       endif
00458 
00459 
00460       end subroutine test_error
00461 
00462 ! ======================================================================================
00463 
00464       subroutine amux_local (n, x, y, a,ja,ia)
00465 
00466         implicit none
00467 
00468         real(wp), dimension(:), intent(in   ) :: x,a
00469         real(wp), dimension(:), intent(  out) :: y
00470         integer,                intent(in   ) :: n
00471         integer, dimension(:),  intent(in   ) :: ja,ia
00472 
00473         !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00474         !         A times a vector
00475         !----------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00476         ! multiplies a matrix by a vector using the dot product form
00477         ! Matrix A is stored in compressed sparse row storage.
00478         !
00479         ! on entry:
00480         !----------
00481         ! n     = row dimension of A
00482         ! x     = real array of length equal to the column dimension of
00483         !         the A matrix.
00484         ! a, ja,
00485         !    ia = input matrix in compressed sparse row format.
00486         !
00487         ! on return:
00488         !-----------
00489         ! y     = real array of length n, containing the product y=Ax
00490         !
00491         !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00492         ! local variables
00493     
00494         real(wp) :: t
00495         integer  :: i, k
00496             
00497         do i = 1,n
00498           t = 0.0_wp        !     compute the inner product of row i with vector x
00499           do k=ia(i), ia(i+1)-1
00500             t = t + a(k)*x(ja(k))
00501           enddo
00502           y(i) = t          !     store result in y(i) 
00503         enddo
00504 
00505       end subroutine amux_local
00506 
00507 
00508       end module SBP_Coef_Module
